divs: sighting detailstoday the weather was very hot and during the sunset above the sun i saw the object flying. i tried tracking it but it disappeared . it lookek like silver\chrome color. wanted to take a pic but i couldnt find it. this made me a believer!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Huntington Park
There were no other sightings in Huntington Park on or around August 30th 2013
Summary: during the sunset above the sun i saw the object flying
